result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael A Schultz

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft is in custody - Atty John Wallace appears on deft's behalf. 
Parties request plea/sentencing hearing.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael A Schultz
Current: 9512 Sandhill Dr, Schofield, WI 54476   (Effective: 10-03-2022)
Prior: 9512 Sandhill Dr, Vrothschild, WI 54476

Case called: 10:07 a.m. 
Clerk: Heather.      
Defendant appears from MCJ, pro se.

Defendant indicates he does not qualify for SPD. 
Defendant has not been able to contact his current Atty, Atty John Wallace.
COURT questions defendant re: employment/income;
COURT denies appointment of counsel, defendant not found indigent at this time. 

DATES to remain. 

Adjourned: 10:09 a.m.

No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents. Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol. Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:23 p.m. 

State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
Prelim Time Limits Waived. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

DATES:
IH: 10/6/22 @ 9:30 a.m. 
STC: 10/31/22 @ 2:15 p.m. Br. 3.

Adjourned: 2:28 p.m.
